File libsrc/libmath/validData.c

Public Functions

invalidData 
 int invalidData(int nsamp,
                 float *data,
                 double value)
Check a float data array for finite numbers. Replace all elements of the input floating point array that are not valid finite numbers with the input value.

Parameters:
nsamp - The length of the data array.
data - An array of data points to check.
value - A number to substitude for invalid (!finite) data elements.
Returns:
The number of data points that are invalid.
